snippet: The graphic designer Stefan Sagmeister has created an unusual exhibition called “The Happy Show” that opens on Wednesday at the Institute of Contemporary Art in Philadelphia.
abstract: Graphic designer Stefan Sagmeister's installation The Happy Show, at the Institute of Contemporary Art in Philadelphia, compliments The Happy Film, a feature-length documentary he is making about the quest for happiness.
lead_paragraph: The graphic designer Stefan Sagmeister has created an unusual exhibition called “The Happy Show” that opens on Wednesday at the Institute of Contemporary Art in Philadelphia.
